title: Materials by Type
content:
Lecture Videos Full set of lecture videos for the course.
Lecture Notes Lecture slides and notes that are used in the videos.
Lecture Code These are accompanying code files for lecture notes and lecture videos.
Finger Exercises Finger exercises are mini-questions that accompany each lecture.
Problem Sets Problem sets and solutions are assigned for a grade.
Recitations Recitations were smaller sections that reviewed the previous lectures. Recitations occurred every Friday. Files contain recitation notes and worked examples in code.
